cause_of_action: alleged noncompliance with health and safety regulations
application_details: Merck argued that Apotex's NOC violated linkage regulations due to timing issues and product monograph discrepancies
procedure_followed: Judicial review application filed by Merck against Health Canada and Apotex. Cross-examinations and document production motions followed.
decision_reasoning: Merck lacks standing to raise health and safety concerns outside the scope of patent protection
result_of_case: Partially allowed; Merck permitted to question issues under linkage regulations but barred from raising health and safety concerns.
